'''Guhua's Legacy''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Jadeite Redolence]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 121]],<!--delete the following if they fix this inconsistency later on--> displayed in the [[Realm Music]] interface under the name '''Past Glories of Wangshan'''.
